Name: Stairs Cocktail
Ingredients: 7.5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Martini glass .
Prepare garnish of a pear wedge.
Garnish with pear wedge on rim.
Review: In London's cockney rhyming slang 'apples and pears' means stairs. Thus, this tasty cocktail is appropriately named.
History: Created in 2000 by Ian Baldwin at the GE Club, London, England
Nutrition: One serving of Stairs Cocktail contains 185 calories
